channel.title: VexOnline 317/508/602 - Creating fun for everyone
channel.description:
This is just a quick copy+paste of my development thread on RL, i'll edit it for mopar later.
Feedback? Constructive feedback is really useful. Thanks.
[img]http://i980.photobucket.com/albums/ae290/supp85/runelogic-5-1.png[/img]
NOTE: ETERNITYX WAS THE OLD SERVER NAME, BUT I HAD TO RENAME IT BECAUSE ANOTHER SERVER HAD THAT NAME. IT IS NOW CALLED VEXONLINE.
Hey there. [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20115-51-58PM.png[/img] VexOnline
Welcome to the VexOnline! This thread covers all of the updates and revision history of the VexOnline progress. The VexOnline team consists of Nexus (the Owner). He is looking for some friendly staff members with good grammar and who don't beg for a staff spot.
VexOnline was created with future evolution in thought. We feel that the current Project Insanity layout and code are not designed with the person in mind, but more to give a feeling of stability without quality. The original makers of DSPK attempted to fix this by adding new features, but it horribly destroyed the quality of the stability of it. Our goal is to combine the two to create great stability with great features. We have a great environment for skillers and pkers alike. Combat has been modified to be more fair and more realistic. The server has several dialogues as well to reawaken the once proud RuneScape feeling. Join now and feel the reawakening at VexOnline!
Features
-525 Gameframes 602 NPC's 634 Items 602 GFX 602 Anims 508 Maps New Combat System New Bosses Alching Point System Prestige System (COD style) 100% GWD (Working on Real Maps) A Donorzone that can be viewed by NonDonors Working Request Assitance Achievement System Custom Skill Interface New Staff System Custom Quest Tab Working Extremes/Overloads/Sanfew Potions and much more!
Future
More 508 Maps Start a GE system of some kind Redo the Skilling system Redo Event system Do some more work on combat Enhance Pking System Finish Prestige System Make more of the RuneScape world useable Create a professional looking forums Complete Achievement System More will be added!
As you can see, there are clearly several items that have been added and created. If you wish to stay updated on the server's progress (Moderators do note this is to check out UPDATES not to advertise.) you may visit us at the following link:
Revision History
Client Side:
New login scripts, less lag and better connection to the server through a hosting process. Reformatted auto-downloading scripts, for faster cache download. More 508 interfaces and maps loaded. All other missing objects that werent added in the beginning. Prayers. Teleport animations.
Runescape trade screen Runescape equipment interface 508 maps 508 Objects 602 Anims + Gfx 634 items lunar interface
Server Side:
Never before seen home. Original layout. New, reformatted shops. No dupes in shops. Nexus is sexy as hell. Rewrote server connection packets to maintain a better performance.
Perfect wildy ditch crossing. 10+ Bosses (Tormented Demons, Avatar Of Destruction, Penance Queen, Corporal Beast, Nomad, Godwars, Giant Sea Snake, Dagannoth Kings and more...) Bounty Hunter Map + Multi Pk zone. Clan Wars Map + Multi Pk Zone. Pkpoint Shop. Dungineering Cape emote. Donator zone. New train zone.
Staff List
Owner Nexus
Head Admin -
Admins -
Moderators
Loveandpower Fabian
EternityX is a new server awaiting various types of players. Anyone could join, its a community for all RSPS players. Here, you can learn not only about others, but about yourself by experiencing perfect PVP and PVN, new never before seen bosses, and many other mind boggling additions.
As of right now, i'm looking for a web designer (forums programmer). Please PM me if your interested; must have atleast 1 forum to show me as an example.
NEW GAME FRAME! NO MORE OF THAT 317 CRAP! (DISREGARD THE GAMEFRAME AT THE BOTTOM PICTURES, THAT WAS BEFORE THE UPDATE - STILL HAVE 508 CACHE!)
[IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/4-14-20113-54-17PM-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/4-14-20117-25-08PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/4-15-20112-43-55PM.png[/img]
And now other pictures.
[IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-36-00PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-33-34PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-32-06PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-30-55PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-26-19PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20113-21-53PM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1142.photobucket.com/albums/n609/Nexus101x/4-12-20112-50-39PM.png[/img]

item.title: VexOnline 317/508/602 - Creating fun for everyone
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

This is just a quick copy+paste of my development thread on RL, i’ll edit it for mopar later.

Feedback? Constructive feedback is really useful. Thanks.

NOTE: ETERNITYX WAS THE OLD SERVER NAME, BUT I HAD TO RENAME IT BECAUSE ANOTHER SERVER HAD THAT NAME. IT IS NOW CALLED VEXONLINE.

Hey there.

VexOnline

Welcome to the VexOnline! This thread covers all of the updates and revision history of the VexOnline progress. The VexOnline team consists of Nexus (the Owner). He is looking for some friendly staff members with good grammar and who don’t beg for a staff spot.

VexOnline was created with future evolution in thought. We feel that the current Project Insanity layout and code are not designed with the person in mind, but more to give a feeling of stability without quality. The original makers of DSPK attempted to fix this by adding new features, but it horribly destroyed the quality of the stability of it. Our goal is to combine the two to create great stability with great features. We have a great environment for skillers and pkers alike. Combat has been modified to be more fair and more realistic. The server has several dialogues as well to reawaken the once proud RuneScape feeling. Join now and feel the reawakening at VexOnline!

Features

-525 Gameframes
602 NPC’s
634 Items
602 GFX
602 Anims
508 Maps
New Combat System
New Bosses
Alching Point System
Prestige System (COD style)
100% GWD (Working on Real Maps)
A Donorzone that can be viewed by NonDonors
Working Request Assitance
Achievement System
Custom Skill Interface
New Staff System
Custom Quest Tab
Working Extremes/Overloads/Sanfew Potions
and much more!

Future

More 508 Maps
Start a GE system of some kind
Redo the Skilling system
Redo Event system
Do some more work on combat
Enhance Pking System
Finish Prestige System
Make more of the RuneScape world useable
Create a professional looking forums
Complete Achievement System
More will be added!

As you can see, there are clearly several items that have been added and created. If you wish to stay updated on the server’s progress (Moderators do note this is to check out UPDATES not to advertise.) you may visit us at the following link:

Revision History

Client Side:

New login scripts, less lag and better connection to the server through a hosting process.
Reformatted auto-downloading scripts, for faster cache download.
More 508 interfaces and maps loaded.
All other missing objects that werent added in the beginning.
Prayers.
Teleport animations.

Runescape trade screen
Runescape equipment interface
508 maps
508 Objects
602 Anims + Gfx
634 items
lunar interface

Server Side:

Never before seen home.
Original layout.
New, reformatted shops.
No dupes in shops.
Nexus is sexy as hell.
Rewrote server connection packets to maintain a better performance.

Perfect wildy ditch crossing.
10+ Bosses (Tormented Demons, Avatar Of Destruction, Penance Queen, Corporal Beast, Nomad, Godwars, Giant Sea Snake, Dagannoth Kings and more…)
Bounty Hunter Map + Multi Pk zone.
Clan Wars Map + Multi Pk Zone.
Pkpoint Shop.
Dungineering Cape emote.
Donator zone.
New train zone.

Staff List

Owner
Nexus

Head Admin

Admins

Moderators

Loveandpower
Fabian

EternityX is a new server awaiting various types of players. Anyone could join, its a community for all RSPS players. Here, you can learn not only about others, but about yourself by experiencing perfect PVP and PVN, new never before seen bosses, and many other mind boggling additions.

As of right now, i’m looking for a web designer (forums programmer). Please PM me if your interested; must have atleast 1 forum to show me as an example.

NEW GAME FRAME! NO MORE OF THAT 317 CRAP! (DISREGARD THE GAMEFRAME AT THE BOTTOM PICTURES, THAT WAS BEFORE THE UPDATE - STILL HAVE 508 CACHE!)



And now other pictures.
